page.title: 20GREAT MALVERN DIRECTORY
page.content: { }The associations etc. written about can be contacted at the following addresses and Malvern 'phone numbers : { {2 Tourism}- Information Centre ,{2700 {3 Conservators}-Priors Croft,{61671 {5 Malvern Gazette},{66414/5/6 {7/10 Festival/E.S.O.},{67522 {11 Museum}- Abbey Gateway,{67811} {8 Malvern Priory},{61020} {16 Manor Park}- Club House,{4010 {18 C.C.S. }- Library Buildings,{63872 {6 Hills College}-Albert Rd.Nth,{65351 {9 R.S.R.E.}- South Site,{2733 { }- North Site,{2781} {17 Folk Dancing}- Old Meg,{2115} - Silurian,{67895 {15 Alternative Malvern}- Ahimsa,{4159} - Parents Anonymous,{68228 -Fountain Group,{63022 {( N.B.}the numbers before each name refers to the text page number{)
